name: Gearborn
description: Mechanical beings infused with arcane energy, built for labor, war, or innovation, now forging their own destinies.
traits: Clockwork Resilience: Immune to disease and resistant to poison.
Integrated Tools: Can store a small gadget inside their body.
Magitech Core: Can absorb magical energy once per long rest to regain health or power a device.

name: Aetherians
description: Beings infused with raw magical energy, their bodies flickering between physical and ethereal states.
traits: Floating Form: Ignores difficult terrain and hovers slightly above the ground.
Aether Pulse: Once per long rest, unleash a burst of magic that repels nearby enemies.
Spell Resonance: Can detect nearby magical disturbances.

name: Steamforged
description: Humans enhanced with mechanical implants, using steam-driven augmentations for power.
traits: Cybernetic Frame: Increased durability, but vulnerable to electrical damage.
Built-In Tool: Starts with a minor enhancement (e.g., telescopic vision, retractable blade).
Overdrive Mode: Temporarily boost a physical stat at the risk of overheating.

name: Gloomkin
description: Mysterious, shadow-touched beings who exist between dimensions, skilled in stealth and mysticism.
traits: Shadow Step: Can teleport short distances in dim light or darkness.
Eerie Perception: Can see magical energy and hidden pathways.
Haunting Presence: Once per long rest, cause nearby enemies to hesitate in fear.

name: Emberkin
description: A race born of fire magic and industry, their bodies radiate warmth and energy.
traits: Inner Furnace: Resistant to heat damage, but sensitive to extreme cold.
Forge Affinity: Gains a bonus when crafting or repairing mechanical devices.
Ignition Burst: Once per long rest, release a fiery shockwave when injured.

name: Skyborn
description: Descendants of ancient winged beings, they thrive in high altitudes and maneuver effortlessly through the air.
traits: Glide: Can slow fall and move short distances in the air.
Hawkâ€™s Sight: Superior vision, granting proficiency in Perception.
Stormcall: Can manipulate minor weather effects around them.
